title: Chocolate mousse with mango swirls and fruit salad
ingredients: ['For the chocolate mousse', '150g dark chocolate (with at least 70% cocoa)', '150ml double cream', 'For the fruit salad', '1 pink grapefruit, peeled and segmented', '1 kiwi, peeled and sliced thinly', '200g raspberries, rinsed', '200g blueberries, rinsed', '5cm piece root ginger, peeled', '1 vanilla bean', 'For the mango swirls', '250m water', '40g caster sugar', '1 mango, peeled and stone removed', '5g agar agar']
